page.title: 15a School Day
page.content: I get up at 7.00 am and have a breakfast of cornflakes, toast and jam and a cup of tea.We getto school just in time for a quick playtime.At 9.00 am we go inside and have a service prepared by the older ones.We settle down to work and start off with English.At 10.30 am we stop for break. We take out skipping ropes and play with a big rope.At 10.45 am we go inside to do maths until 12 noon,when we stop for dinner.From 12.25 until 1pm. we have playtime, sometimes on the field.At 1pm. we go in and work until 2.40 pm.We study History, geogaphy, Nature, Sience, drama, Music, Art and Craft.We don't have a playtime in the afternoon but at 2.40 pm we go on the field for a game of rounders.At 3.30 pm we go inside and tidy up then we go home. .
